name: Bigfoot Hunter Simulator
description:
Discover this astonishing world. Use everything you find to survive. You have to be more careful of the nights.

It all started in the spring of 2018. The newspapers published message about the disappearance of a group of tourists in the national park. Police believe it was just an accident, because the band went to raft on the river. But your team sure that this definitely involves one of the most elusive creatures that are called Bigfoot or Sasquatch.

Set up traps and cameras.
You have to find tourists
Explore abandoned buildings and shelters. Find weapons. Using various materials.
